EmailTemplate.subject: How to Automate Test Cases with Tosca Testsuite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
How to Automate Test Cases with Tosca Testsuite!
Dear {{lead.First Name}}, We hope you’re enjoying the trial version of Tosca Testsuite! Have you had a chance to check out our Trial Tour <https://documentation.tricentis.com/en/821/content/trial/trial_tour.htm>? There are some great tutorials and videos including these 3 simple steps to help you get started with Tosca Testsuite:
1. See how Tosca Testsuite can scan any application to Create Modules <https://documentation.tricentis.com/en/821/content/trial/videos/video_create_module.htm>
2. Once modules have been created, Test Cases are built up through a series of drag and drop options, seen here <https://documentation.tricentis.com/en/821/content/trial/videos/video_assign_module.htm>
3. Following the creation of Test Cases, see how easy it is to Create and Run an Execution List <https://documentation.tricentis.com/en/821/content/trial/videos/video_create_executionlist.htm>
Hope you’ve found this helpful! More useful tips are headed your way!
Best wishes,
The Tricentis Team trial@tricentis.com <mailto:trial@tricents.com>
